description: Main source file for a Flutter-based TV interface app. It includes application entry point, data models, the main HomeScreen widget with focus management and UI components like hero banner, recommendations carousel, and interactive buttons, as well as associated widgets.

classes.name: HomeData
classes.description: Data model for the home JSON, including title, tags, synopsis, hero poster, and recommendations.

classes.name: Recommendation
classes.description: Represents a recommended item with id, title, and poster URL.

classes.name: HomeScreen
classes.description: Main widget for the application's home screen, managing focus, loading data, and composing UI components.

classes.name: DirectionalFocusIntent
classes.description: Intent used for D-pad navigation to move focus in specified direction.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point that runs the TvApp.

methods.name: _loadHome
methods.description: Loads local JSON data for the home screen via rootBundle and updates state.

methods.name: _handleDirectionalFocus
methods.description: Handles D-pad focus shifts in a stable manner using focusInDirection.
